sentences.sContent: His tables and chairs are still in the Elysee Palace in Paris and his sofas, bookcase and desk adorn other rooms.
sentences.sCn: 波林的桌子和椅子仍在在法国巴黎的爱丽舍宫，而他的沙发，书柜和书桌，也装饰着其他的房间。

sentences.sContent: There was no desk, no bookcase, not even a table, only the nasty couch, with a typewriter on another milk crate in front of it.
sentences.sCn: 既没有写字台，也没有书柜，甚至连一张桌子都没有。 只有一个肮脏的沙发，还有摆在它前面的另一个牛奶箱，以及那上面的一台打字机。

remMethod.val: book(书)+case(容器)→装书的容器→书柜， 书架

trans.tranOther: a piece of furniture with shelves to hold books
